Plot: Muriel finds life in Porpoise Spit, Australia dull and spends her days alone in her room listening to Abba music and dreaming of her wedding day. Slight problem, Muriel has never had a date...
Title: Muriel's Wedding
Actors: Sophie Lee, Roz Hammond, Toni Collette, Belinda Jarrett
tomatoConsensus: Heartfelt and quirky, though at times broad, Muriel's Wedding mixes awkward comedy, oddball Australian characters, and a nostalgia-heavy soundtrack.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 8 wins & 10 nominations.
